body_html:
I have set the variables
chris@chris:$ echo $CUDA_HOME
/usr/local/cuda-9.1
chris@chris:$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/home/chris/torch/install/lib:/home/chris/torch/install/lib:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/home/chris/torch/install/lib:

and，I found that there is no such lib in the cuda/lib64.
does tf1.5 not support cuda 9.1?

body:
**I have set the variables**
chris@chris:~$ echo $CUDA_HOME
/usr/local/cuda-9.1
chris@chris:~$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/home/chris/torch/install/lib:/home/chris/torch/install/lib:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/home/chris/torch/install/lib:

and，I found that there is no such lib in the cuda/lib64.
does tf1.5 not support cuda 9.1?
